item.description: Meet at the Prosper Road Trail Head at 2pm. Walk/hike around Mt. Tom and then head to Bentleys Restaurant (http://www.bentleysre...) in Woodstock for what may be an early dinner. This should be a pretty leisurely outing, nothing strenuous. To get to the trail head, take route 12 north out of Woodstock for 1.5 miles to the small green sign "To West Woodstock" and turn left onto Prosper Road. Continue .7 or 1.3 miles (there are discrepancies on the distance) on this dirt road to an obvious parking area in a stand of pine trees on your left. This is being cross posted with the Manchester & the Mountains Activities group.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike Mt. Tom in Woodstock
